content.rendered:
Technological innovations are one of the formidable aspects of supporting entrepreneurs and business leaders in business transformations and developing new products. The metaverse has evolved as a productive technology innovation that can help fuel many strategic business opportunities. The search for metaverse business opportunities has increased extremely after the involvement of big companies in the metaverse projects became obvious. In this article on the five metaverse business opportunities: a detailed guide, we discuss some of the most promising business opportunities you can explore using metaverse. 

Virtual space with features allowing people to explore digital spaces and interact with other users has a lot of advantages suitable for developing new businesses. However, the practicability of metaverse businesses when the metaverse itself is under development is something to be considered. At the same time, we cannot ignore the potential of the metaverse in the coming future. 

Also read How to Get a Metaverse License in Dubai.

Metaverse in Business

Many of you must have checked for the definition of the metaverse before looking for possible business opportunities for doing business in the metaverse. The metaverse is a persistent and shared virtual space, which exists in real-time and emerges from the convergence of virtually enhanced physical reality and virtual reality. No single seller will have complete control over the metaverse and the virtual environment will be device-independent. The interplay of business opportunities and the metaverse also becomes evident in the fact that the metaverse features an independent virtual economy. The metaverse economy runs on the power of NFTs or non-fungible tokens and digital currencies. 

 

Some of the most well known technologies underlying the metaverse include: 

  • AR or Augmented Reality
  • IoT or Internet of Things
  • AR cloud
  • Spatial Technologies
  • Head-mounted displays

 

Tech experts have declared the metaverse as the next-generation evolution of the internet, where websites become digital spaces in a virtual shared environment. Therefore, businesses can reap the many benefits from the metaverse just like web 2.0 and the internet facilitated the rise of e-commerce. 

Possibilities With the Use of Metaverse in Business

The metaverse has a lot of business opportunities underlying its foundation and is probably the next iteration of the internet. However, it is unavoidable to wonder about the possibilities which businesses can explore in the new virtual space. The hype around it is undoubtedly unparalleled for any new technology trend. Many tech companies have started claiming that they are metaverse companies, while some are developing metaverse platforms for enhancing the physical and virtual realities of users. In addition to all that, the feasibility of metaverse business opportunities relies fully on the execution of activities currently running in silos, in a single shared space. 

 

Here are some of the significant activities on the metaverse which can support new business opportunities:

  • Buying accessories, outfits, and other artifacts for digital avatars
  • Shopping in virtual malls and retail stores with immersive e-commerce
  • Purchasing digital assets, arts, and collectibles as non-fungible tokens
  • Participating in virtual social experiences
  • Using virtual classrooms for fuelling immersive learning experiences
  • Development of virtual homes and purchasing digital real estate
  • Interactions with users as digital avatars for employee onboarding, customer service, sales, service, and many other business communications

 

Also read How to Get a Mainland License in Dubai

Business Opportunities in Metaverse

 

The main focus for anyone thinking to start a business using metaverse would be on the scope of opportunity. How can you build a business using metaverse and how will it benefit you? The answers to such a question can be easily drawn toward the various potential uses of the metaverse. Here is a small outline of the 5 metaverse business opportunities curated for you:


  • Virtual Events 

During the last two years, virtual events have become popular. The metaverse offers immense support for enabling improved integrated solutions with the help of virtual events. With the help of immersive experiences in the metaverse, virtual event planners can conduct events where the attendees will feel as if they are physically present at the event even though they are not. 

 

One of the most popular examples to showcase the potential of opportunities in the metaverse with the use of virtual events is Fortnite. Celebrities such as Ariana Grande and Travis Scott have performed in virtual concerts on Fortnite. 



  • Immersive Learning Experiences

The next item on the list of metaverse business opportunities is immersive learning experiences. Higher education, medical education, military applications, and many other sectors could make use of the metaverse for delivering more immersive learning experiences. And most important of all, businesses need not build any infrastructure for enabling the metaverse as it will be already available with the metaverse. 

Applications of a metaverse in the education system would involve VR spaces as well as enabling layers of digital information over the real world with the use of digital headsets. VR-based learning can help improve the way students interact with different ideas and concepts. 



  • Immersive Shopping Experiences

The retail sector is the next big thing when exploring business opportunities pertaining to the metaverse. In addition to all that, the metaverse can serve as an ideal platform for the introduction of new and complex products. Many brands in the retail sector such as Zara, Alibaba, Nike, Balenciaga, and Louis Vuitton have already started experimenting with the metaverse. 

Imagine being able to visit a fashion outlet in the metaverse as a digital avatar. You can explore the store and all the products in it just like you would explore a store in the real world. Metaverse allows you to try on the clothes and accessories on your digital avatar so you can find out how a pair of jeans or dress fits you. 

 

  • Social Media

Another frontier that offers favorable grounds for many metaverse business opportunities is social media. Metaverse technology can serve as the ideal basis for new and complex social media platforms as digital avatars in diverse virtual spaces. 

 

Almost real-life social experiences are probably the next big thing in the evolution of social media. The metaverse has everything it requires to create independent virtual communities on social media platforms with their own ecosystems. As a result, the social media metaverse will allow people to talk to their friends in the same space even if they are miles apart. 


  • Employee Engagement

The most crucial entry among the metaverse business opportunities would be to focus on employee engagement. Business enterprises could focus on and utilize the metaverse for empowering virtually augmented workspaces. In addition to that, the metaverse could also connect with employees, foster better engagement, and build collaboration among them. 

 

The metaverse can provide the best platform to help drive collaboration among employees. For example, Microsoft has adopted the metaverse to transform workspaces. The Microsoft Mesh is developing as a virtual workspace where the users can access all the Microsoft services in one place. 



A&A Associate, one of the top business setup consultants in Dubai, UAE, offers a whole range of legal, accounting, auditing, and management solutions under a single roof. Our team of professionals has experience in various industry sectors and has handled multiple roles at all levels.

 

Contact us for any queries or concerns you might have.
